intro: Ixora puberula, commonly known as the velvet ixora, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It is characterized by its dense, velvety foliage and clusters of small, bright red or orange flowers. The plant belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes other well-known ornamental plants. Ixora puberula thrives in full sun and well-drained soil, making it a popular choice for gardens and landscapes.
